group_1.narration: We met at the crossroads of fate...
I have no idea who Kyubey is…@but I'm certain that he's not of this world.
At first I thought he was a messenger of the gods…@but in speaking with him, I realized differently.

group_1.textRight: And if I become one,@I can make any wish come true?

group_1.narration: It was only then that I thought I was dreaming.
"I can make any wish come true…"@Is that even possible…?
And then I had a suspicion…@that Kyubey was likely a malevolent being.
A dangerous beast, like Loki deceiving Thor…

group_1.textRight: …You really mean my wish will come true?

group_1.narration: I made a contract to become a Magical Girl.
My wish was to form a warrior band@with my older sister as its leader.
And the first step to break free from our lives...@was to gain strength.
Furthermore, if we were to travel the world,@we needed a solid foundation for our dream...@So I factored that into my wish as well.
At that point, our destiny took a strange turn...

group_1.textCenter: As long as that wish comes true…@I don't care what happens to me.
